title: What world should know about Dr. Varatharaja before he speaks at UNHRC in Geneva against Sri Lanka
content: Tipped to speak at the UNHRC Sessions in Geneva on 19th March 2014 is Dr. Varatharaja, one of the five doctors who appeared in the Channel 4 clips and who also admitted that he and the other doctors lied and who has now found his way to foreign climes with the help of the Tamil…
